content: Hi Sarah, are you still DMing the D&D campaign next week?
Yes, John! We're all set for Thursday at 6pm. Don't forget your character sheet!
Great, I'll be there. I updated my character with the new spells we found.
Everyone, I've prepared a new dungeon for our session this week. Be prepared for traps!
I'll bring snacks for everyone. Any requests?
This campaign has been amazing so far! Looking forward to our next session.
Agreed! The story is getting really interesting. I wonder what will happen to our characters next.
I've been running D&D campaigns for 5 years now. If anyone needs help getting started as a DM, feel free to message me!
I might take you up on that offer, Sarah! I've always wanted to try being a Dungeon Master.
Hey Emily, want to join our Pandemic Legacy campaign? We need one more player.
Is this tournament suitable for beginners? I've only played Pandemic a few times.
Absolutely! We welcome players of all skill levels. There will be a brief rules refresher before we start.
Pandemic is one of my favorite cooperative games. The tension of drawing cards is just right!
I'd love to join the Pandemic Legacy campaign! When are you planning to start?
Don't forget our weekly tournament this Saturday at 2pm!
